metadata.name: A Short Break
metadata.description:
Municipal workers were having a a little rest in their break time.

Artist : Erdem Kuybulu
Edition : 1/1
Location : Antalya / Turkey
Year : 2023
Camera : Olympus OM-D E5 MarkIII
EXIF : 1/200 sec @ f/6,3 ISO 200
Size : 3888 x 5184 300 dpi
